amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part B of House Report 119-462 to prohibit the use of funds made available by this Act to implement section 24220 of the Infrastructure Investment and Jobs Act, including any requirements enabling or supporting vehicle "kill switch" technology, and to block federal spending for the execution or enforcement of such authorities.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds to implement section 24220 of the Infrastructure Investment and Jobs Act, including any requirements enabling or supporting vehicle "kill switch" technology, and to prohibit federal spending for the execution or enforcement of such authorities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Massie amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 164 - 268 (Roll no. 43).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Massie amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 164 - 268 (Roll no. 43).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
